'''Complimentary Bar Food''' is [[Diona]]'s [[Utility Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* If this talent activates while Diona cooks [[Mondstadt Grilled Fish]], it is possible to double the amount of her special dish, [[Definitely Not Bar Food!]]
{{Talents by Category List|Perfect Recovery Dish Cooking Talents|header=identical|nottitle=Complimentary Bar Food}}
